lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am no longer loaning money unless I can find loans with a Portfolio yield that is fair.  I believe kiva’s field partners are making an exorbitant return on the investment of our money. I’ve seen rates as high as 57.8%, some are much less like 19% but I think that these amounts are usurious and put are putting an unfair burden on people who cannot afford it. It is making the administrators of our money rich and keeping the ones we wanted to help in a cycle of debt to the banks. I would never take a loan or a credit card with even a 19% APR myself and I wouldn’t want anyone else to have to either.

Then when you walked away, she started

DONALD
I knew. I heard them.

KAUFMAN
How come you looked so happy?

DONALD
I loved Sarah, Charles. It was mine,

She thought you were pathetic.

That was her business, not mine. You are what you love, not what loves you.
